description:
This course goes over how to get high paying clients on freelancing sites like Elance, even if you are a beginner, without cold calling, networking, or sending spam emails. Some topics include:

  • How to stand out from your competitors
  • How to target the right clients
  • How to pick the right sites and channels for finding freelance projects
  • Setting up payment schedules to ensure you get paid
  • Common freelancing mistakes that will cause you to fail
  • And more!
title: Freelance Client Secrets - A Beginner's Guide to Freelancing
